body_html:
I am having the same error when installing TensorFlow1.0 in RH7.2
I am installing as root and I am using the pip install method.

Processing ./tensorflow-1.0.1-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.zip
Complete output from command python setup.py egg_info:
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in
IOError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/tmp/pip-build/setup.py'

This the output to my pip - V:
pip 9.0.1 from /root/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages (python 2.7)
I have already tried pip install --upgrade

Thanks,

body:
I am having the same error when installing TensorFlow1.0 in RH7.2
 I am installing as root and I am using the pip install method.

Processing ./tensorflow-1.0.1-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.zip
    Complete output from command python setup.py egg_info:
    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
    IOError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/tmp/pip-build/setup.py'

This the output to my pip - V:
 pip 9.0.1 from /root/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages (python 2.7)
I have already tried pip install --upgrade

Thanks,
